ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Nerf Protest.
ygData.msgSnippet: Verant Guy #1: 	Hmm, sure is quiet in here. Verant Guy #2:  Yeah, all the enchanters are protesting by not playing. Verant Guy #1:  Really? We ll have to thank
ygData.messageBody:
Verant Guy #1: Hmm, sure is quiet in here.
Verant Guy #2: Yeah, all the enchanters are protesting by not playing.
Verant Guy #1: Really? We'll have to thank them later. Look! The
feedback list is cut in half today. You sure this isnt' a holiday?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: WeinisFROG@... [SMTP:WeinisFROG@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 3:58 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enchanter Nerf Protest.
>
> From: WeinisFROG@...
>
> In a message dated 5/19/99 4:29:26 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
> s.fog@... writes:
>
> << ok I will submit to this Strike on May 22, but i dont really think
> that its
> gonna get thier attentions, i think we all need to decide a message
> to send
> everyday as a /bug and maybe with enough of us sending this everyday
> we
> might get thier attention, hopefully. >>
>
> i have to aggree with him he makes a point
>
